name: The End (LittleGames)
description:
This is a game I created for the Dream Hack apocalypse jam.  I missed the entry deadline by more than a month.  It was a 72 hour jam.  I learned a lot making this game.  Please take a look and let me know what you think.

Controls:

W- Thrust

A- Left

D- Right

Z- arm your weapon

The object is to arbitrarily destroy and discover new worlds.  Pretty bleak.  My next game will be more uplifting.
